title: Kippenberger Psychobuildings - sans serif - font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the font used for Kippenberger Psychobuildings

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

comments.content: Looks like Helvetica, maybe Helvetica Neue 45 or one of the weights
